author: Jill Dupleix
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/355F/Gas 4.  Use your hands to mulch the egg whites, sugar, coconut, lime zest and juice in a bowl until they lightly come together.  With wet hands, press the mixture into a flat, square shape about 1cm/0.5in high. Use a small upturned liqueur glass to cut out small rounds, and place on a lightly oiled or nonstick baking tray. Bake for 12-15 minutes in the centre of the oven until very lightly golden, just touched with colour. Cool the macaroons on a wire rack, and store in an airtight jar.
ingredients: 2 egg whites,  100g/3½oz caster sugar,  160g/5½oz desiccated coconut,  1 tsp grated lime zest,  1 tbsp lime juice
